programmes.show_description: Teleshopping.
Dermot travels south to the coastal enclave of Kinsale, which is known as the gourmet capital of Ireland, to learn about seaweed and go foraging for wild garlic.

Jeremy invites best friend and chef Simon Rimmer on a trip down memory lane as he shows him the sights of his old family holidays and tastes of nostalgia.
As the Nottingham Inquiry continues, we speak to the mum of victim Barnaby Webber, who was killed in 2023.
The best tips to start saving, whatever your budget; Vogue has the latest Showbiz headlines; and from scaffolder to stand-up comedy - Tom Davis ahead of his new tour.

programmes.show_name: Rising Scams: What You Need to...

programmes.show_name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programmes.show_description: Six more contestants compete for a place in the million-pound hot seat - find out if anyone got what it takes to answer 15 questions correctly to win a staggering one million pounds.
